query:
mutation ($input0:UpdateBbpLaunchConfigurationPolicyInput!) {
		updateBbpLaunchConfigurationPolicy(input:$input0) {
			bbp_launch_configuration {
				attachment {
					_id,
					content_type,
					created_at,
					expiring_url,
					file_name,
					file_size,
					id,
					long_lasting_url,
					moderated,
				},
				current_configuration_step,
				has_changed_brand_promise,
				has_changed_custom_section,
				has_changed_disclosure_policies,
				has_changed_faq,
				has_changed_legal,
				has_changed_out_of_scope,
				has_changed_program_eligibility,
				has_changed_program_rules,
				has_changed_rewards,
				has_changed_safe_harbor,
				id,
				invoice_opt_in,
				launch_at,
				launch_requested_at,
				policy_brand_promise,
				policy_custom_section_content,
				policy_custom_section_name,
				policy_disclosure_policies,
				policy_faq,
				policy_legal,
				policy_out_of_scope,
				policy_program_eligibility,
				policy_program_rules,
				policy_rewards,
				policy_safe_harbor,
				suggested_critical,
				suggested_high,
				suggested_low,
				suggested_medium,
				suggested_min_critical,
				suggested_min_high,
				suggested_min_low,
				suggested_min_medium,
			},
			clientMutationId,
			was_successful,
		}
	}
